title: Jordan
description: In December 2009 my family took a trip to Jordan with a guide that we met on the Peru trip to hike/camp through the desert for a week to Petra.

photos.alt: Ancient pillars in the foreground with many more in the distance.

photos.description: A lizard on a rock wall.
photos.alt: A rock wall with a small lizard.

photos.description: The sun setting over the Dead Sea. Very cold, very salty. Made my skin feel bad.
photos.alt: A sunset over the Dead Sea.

photos.description: A cool double-peaked hill/mountain at sunset.
photos.alt: The sun setting behind a double-peaked mountain.

photos.description: Desert. Saw a lot of this for several days.
photos.alt: A wide view of mostly empty desert with mountains in the background.
A single tree in an otherwise empty, rocky desert.

photos.description: A rock trying to reach the moon.
photos.alt: The tip of a rocky outcropping on a hill with the moon just above it.

photos.description: More desert. There's really a lot of it.
photos.alt: A view of the desert from very high up that extends to the horizon.

photos.description: Then Petra kind of out of nowhere. I don't actually have that many pictures of it because there were too many people in most of the shots.
photos.alt: Carved pillars and designs in a mountainside.
A dark, cloudy sky with bright patches from the setting sun.

photos.description: A camel that I'm about to ride.
